CustomField.description: This field is used to store a separator between Project Name and Kanban Board Name in the subject line of inbound emails. Default Value " :: " . EX:- ( ProjectName :: BoardName ).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to store a separator between Project Name and Kanban Board Name in the subject line of inbound emails. Default Value " :: " . EX:- ( ProjectName :: BoardName ).
CustomField.label: Inbound Email Separator
